snippet: According to a Defense Ministry white paper, North Korea appears to have made progress toward making a nuclear warhead small enough to fit onto a missile capable of reaching the West Coast.
abstract: South Korean Defense Ministry says North Korea apparently has made 'significant' advance toward constructing nuclear warhead that can fit onto long-range missile capable of reaching West Coast of United States.
lead_paragraph: According to a Defense Ministry white paper, North Korea appears to have made progress toward making a nuclear warhead small enough to fit onto a missile capable of reaching the West Coast.

headline.main: North Korea Has Made ‘Significant’ Advances in Nuclear Arms Program, South Says
headline.print_headline: South Korea: Ministry Suggests North Has Made Nuclear Strides
